member.name: WRITE_CACHE_CHANGE
member.summary: Indicates whether the write cache features of a device are changeable.

member.name: WRITE_CACHE_CHANGE.WriteCacheChangeUnknown
member.summary: The system cannot report the write cache change capability of the device.

member.name: WRITE_CACHE_CHANGE.WriteCacheNotChangeable
member.summary: Host software cannot change the characteristics of the device's write cache.

member.name: WRITE_CACHE_CHANGE.WriteCacheChangeable
member.summary: Host software can change the characteristics of the device's write cache.
